suite.name: LoginIOS BDD

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

test.name: Validate Empty Fields Validation

kw.name: Given User is on Login Screen iOS
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"] xpath criteria: //XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="SALON Sign In"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: When User clicks Sign In button iOS
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Then System should display empty field validation errors for both username and password iOS
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=(//XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="This field is required"])[1]' text is 'This field is required'
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.msg: Set test message to: validation error message with 'This field is required'
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=(//XCUIElementTypeStaticText[@name="This field is required"])[2]' text is 'This field is required'
kw.doc: Get element text (for hybrid and mobile browser use `xpath` locator, others might cause problem)

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.msg: Set test message to: validation error message with 'This field is required'
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.

test.doc: Kiểm tra validation khi không nhập UserName & Password
test.status: validation error message with 'This field is required'

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

suite.doc: BDD Structure for iOS Login Flow Tests
